attributes.action: claw back all profits made by MPs via dodgy expenses claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MPs should not be able to use expenses claims to fund a side-business of property development.  It appears that this was what many were doing.

It is completely wrong, and no amount of excuses like 'it was within the system' and 'it is the system that is at fault' will do.  MPs, if you want us to respect you again, man up and donate the profits you made to charity.  Failing that, Brown, enact a law to make this happen.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
